author: TGaskin

comments.content:
Looks like a [Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105910/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/&q=didot&x=0&y=0&sample_text=E%20S%20P%20R%20E%20S%20S%20O) of some sort.

- Lex
Linotype Didot Roman Small caps and Oldstyle Figures. Most probably.
